file_insights.primary_purpose: Define Middleware interface and chain implementation for tool execution

gotchas_discovered: Manual float and int64 formatting to avoid fmt import
Explicit stack trace handling in recovery middleware

approach_outcome.primary_goal: Define Middleware interface and chain implementation

recommendations: Consider adding performance benchmarks for middleware chain overhead
Add comprehensive unit tests for each middleware implementation
Document middleware usage patterns and best practices
Create examples demonstrating complex middleware compositions
